snippet.title: Meet Your Maker Official Release Date Trailer | The Game Awards 2022
snippet.description: Behaviour Interactive, the studio behind the hit horror multiplayer game Dead by Daylight, took part at The Game Awards hosted in Los Angeles to announce the official release date of its upcoming new IP Meet Your Maker. Players from around the world will be able to play Meet Your Makers a unique first-person building-and-raiding experience when it releases April 4th, 2023 on Steam, PlayStation 4,
